price: 16. Si lo deseara, los destruiría y crearía a otros en su lugar.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
